## throttle() function

节流函数，限制某个函数在一定时间间隔内只能执行一次

**Signature:**

```typescript
throttle: (fn: (...args: any) => void, wait?: number, { leading, trailing }?: {
    leading?: boolean | undefined;
    trailing?: boolean | undefined;
}, hint?: () => void) => (...args: any) => void
```

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

fn


</td><td>

(...args: any) =&gt; void


</td><td>

需要节流的函数


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

wait


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ 节流时间间隔，默认为 1000 毫秒


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

{ leading, trailing }


</td><td>

{ leading?: boolean \| undefined; trailing?: boolean \| undefined; }


</td><td>

_(Optional)_


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

hint


</td><td>

() =&gt; void


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ 节流期间执行的函数，用于提示


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

(...args: any) =&gt; void

节流后的函数
